title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements by collaborating with stakeholders and conducting market research.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and infrastructure requirements. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, data privacy, and regulatory compliance aspects. Provide a high-level overview, detailed component diagrams, and a data architecture plan. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards such as GDPR, CCPA, and industry-specific guidelines.

title: Data Pipeline and ETL
description: Develop a robust data pipeline to collect, clean, and transform housing market data from various sources.

title: Machine Learning Model Development
description: Design, train, and optimize machine learning models for housing market trend prediction.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Develop a user-friendly interface for visualizing housing market predictions and insights.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and data privacy laws.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute thorough testing across all components and functionalities.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the application.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation and provide user support channels for the application.
